channel.title: Payment on PR
channel.description: Recent content in Payment on PR

item.title: function.php
item.description:
<?php
  /**
    * @desc Function to print variable for debugging
    */
    function printPre($data, $extended=false)
    {
        echo "<pre>";
        if($extended)
        {
            var_dump($data);
        }
        else
        {
            print_r($data);
        }
        echo "</pre>";
    }
?>

item.title: hsbc_return.php
item.description:
<?php
       
        require_once "function.php";
        require_once "HSBC.php";
        printPre($_POST);
       
        $h1 = new HSBC();
        echo $h1->error($_POST['CpiResultsCode']);
    ?>
